title: How common was slavery among nomadic people? It seems like it would be more difficult to maintain slaves on the move. - Quora

response.answer_text: Large scale slavery would be impractical but most nomads were fundamentally slow moving. The core group would move less than ten miles a day. Slaves could easily walk alongside that group and do the heavy work at the beginning and end of the day. There wasn’t even anywhere for the slaves to run to.
